title: Katya Jones shows off her dancer legs as she leads Strictly stars at Pride Of Britain
text:

It's that time of year again when we celebrate the nation's unsung heroes at the Pride of Britain Awards 2019.

Strictly professional Katya Jones looked sensational as she stepped out at the Pride Of Britain Awards tonight.

The Russian dancer, 30, showed off her toned dancer's legs in a stunning navy gown with an open skirt feature.

Katya posed on the red carpet in the silky satin dress as she expertly moved the skirt around to showcase her incredibly athletic figure.

(Image: Credit: Lia Toby)

The navy outfit featured a pretty sweetheart neckline and subtle cut-out detailing on the bodice which teased a glimpse at her enviable physique.

Katya wore her glossy raven tresses in a sleek bun, while she accentuated her features with a glamorous make-up look.

The dancer led the Strictly Come Dancing arrivals at the star-studded Pride Of Britain Awards red carpet.

(Image: Doug Peters/EMPICS Entertainment)

Katya accessorised her stunning navy ensemble with matching starry earrings.

Carol Vorderman will be hosting the awards tonight, while Prince Charles will be on hand to help honour the Pride of Britain winners .

Pride of Britain will be on ITV on Tuesday 5 November, from 8pm until 10pm.

The Daily Mirror Pride of Britain Awards, in partnership with TSB, will broadcast on ITV on 5th November at 8pm.
description: The Strictly Come Dancing professional showed off her incredible dancer physique at the Pride Of Britain Awards
